author: Special Correspondent
text:
The following have been unanimously elected office-bearers of Lawyers’ Association of Madurai District Court for 2016-18 at a recent meeting:

A. P. Aathithan (president), M. Subramanian (secretary), S. Ilango (treasurer), M. N. Sankaran (founder-senior president), S. Veeranasamy (senior president), A.S.K.A. Hussaini (organising president); N. M. R. S. Poorna Chandhran, V. Nagendran and N. Perumal (vice-presidents); Stella Rajkumar Bessie, G. Muruggan and R. Ramasamy (assistant secretaries).
title: Office-bearers of lawyers’ forum
